name: Code Review of llm-lean-log
problem: Review source code structure and implementation
solution: Comprehensive code review of monorepo with core, CLI, and visualizer packages
action: Analyzed project architecture, reviewed key files, assessed code quality

name: Updated Common Rules Documentation
problem: Update common rules with proper git SHA and installation instructions
solution: Added before-run checklist with CLI installation, help command, and git SHA retrieval
action: Updated .windsurf/rules/common.md, .agent/rules/common.md, and README.md with enhanced logging instructions

name: Import LogEntry type from llm-lean-log-core
problem: LogEntry interface was defined locally in visualizer package instead of importing from core package
solution: Removed local LogEntry interface definition and imported from llm-lean-log-core package
action: Updated types.ts to import LogEntry from core package, added dependency to package.json, installed dependency with bun i

name: Fix TypeScript errors for optional LogEntry fields
problem: TypeScript errors when passing optional LogEntry fields to utility functions
solution: Updated parseTags and extractCode functions to accept string | undefined parameters
action: Modified utils.ts to handle optional fields, added null checks, verified TypeScript compilation
